words.prompt: The ________ of something is how much of that thing there is.
________ is the study of the stars, planets, and other outer space objects.
A ________ is a round model of the world or Earth.
The ________ includes Earth and the other planets that orbit the Sun.
If you ________ someone or something, you provide what they need.
The ________ of something is the outside of it.
The ________ of something tells how hot or how cold that thing is.
________ means the “state of being warm in temperature or feeling.”
When you are in ________, you do not believe something.
To feel ________ is to feel upset because of shock or surprise.
When something is ________, it is amazing.
________ are things that are noticeable about something.
When you are ________ something, you are presented with something that you can accept or turn down.
Something that is ________ is very beautiful or magnificent.
When something is ________, it is the only one of its kind.
To be ________ means “to be watching closely and carefully.”
To be ________ is to be pleasant or ready to agree with something.
To ________ means “to admire highly” or “to be grateful for.”
________ means to have grown suddenly.
________ are people who come from a particular ancestor or group of ancestors.
________ is the number of people who live in a certain region or country.
________ are sources “of aid or support that may be drawn upon when needed.”
________ is the method or means of carrying or moving something from one place to another.
________ are a means of transporting goods or people.
